explains: adj. 有条理的，做事有条不紊的

sentences.en: NASA's methodical approach to the exploration of Mars has not yet answered the questions.
sentences.cn: 美国宇航局有条不紊的火星探索方式尚未解决这些问题。

sentences.en: Somehow this early fascination with life's prodigality, with wet, slimy or creepy-crawly things, becomes systematized and methodical.
sentences.cn: 不知何故，这种早期对生命挥霍无度的迷恋，对潮湿、黏糊糊或令人毛骨悚然的东西的迷恋，变得系统化和有条理了。

sentences.en: It was a methodical, unexciting chore.
sentences.cn: 这是按部就班的乏味的杂务。
